#summary The multiple ways to get GUtil!
#labels Featured

= For end users =
The latest stable version of GUtil! is on the [https://addons.mozilla.org Firefox add-ons site] : https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/3755/

= For developpers =
GUtil! is hosted with [http://code.google.com/hosting/ Google Code Hosting].
You can get the source through [http://code.google.com/p/gutil-firefox-extension/source anonymous svn] _via_ [http://subversion.tigris.org Subversion] :
{{{
svn checkout http://gutil-firefox-extension.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ gutil-firefox-extension
}}}
